message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value of costs incurred to secure customer orders and to deliver goods and services to customers.

Looking at the financial statement provided, particularly the income statement, I need to find the expense line item that relates to sales and marketing activities.

In income statements, "Selling Expenses" typically represents the costs associated with securing customer orders and delivering goods and services. These usually include sales force costs, marketing expenses, advertising, distribution costs, and other expenses directly related to selling products or services.

From the income statement, I can see:
```
Selling Expenses | 1177105.26 | 2024-02-05
```

This is the specific line item that represents the costs incurred to secure customer orders and deliver goods and services to customers.

{"solution": {'value': '1177105.26'}}
